newsitem.title: INDIA: India panel discusses ITI capital recast.
newsitem.headline: India panel discusses ITI capital recast.

text.p: The Indian government's Telecom Commission discussed on Monday a proposal to restructure the capital of state-run Indian Telephone Industries (ITI), a Communications Ministry statement said.
The government's Disinvestment Commission, set up last year to oversee a partial privatisation programme, recommended in April that the government sell up to 74 percent of its stake in the company.

"As the report of the Disinvestment Commission has since been received it was noted that the matter may be processed further in the light of the commission's recommendations and a proposal, thereafter, be placed before the government," the statement said.
